column3: If you're going to fix it, fix it to be actually correct (it's not a blacklist). But I think everyone has had enough bikeshedding over this irrelevant name today. Please just leave it be.
@luke-jr yes, it should be fixed now, let me know if there is any other typo and I'll gladly take all the effort.

I understand exactly what you're feeling and applaud the fact that you've created this PR, but I think at this point it's probably more reasonable with the patience of maintainers here to don't try to revert it anymore. It wouldn't be a long term solution to anything anyway.
Please stop spamming this repo. People have better things to spend their time on.
